name: Rage Mario
description:
A short game made for a KAMK Design Course by me together with Petteri Räsänen who helped me with some scripting. Idea was to replicate existing game mechanics and create a story on top of that.

  • ⌨️ WASD to move, SPACE to jump, Shift to run

Sprite credits: Beam Luinsir Yosho & Zeon

Music credits: PowerGlove - Mario Minor
